If I could make a bloodline I'd like to see something based off the Kaguya clan. I realize that the original three bloodlines deal with all three stats (Legacy for gen, Red Eye for nin, White eye for tai) but I would find it cool if maybe something that could happen with the Kaguya bloodline might be

*Exclusive jutsus taught by bones
*A bloodline jutsu that increases the chance of ally drops (since white eye doesn't do this)
*When one wins 10 arena fights in one day they get Blood lust which gives them plus 2 arena fights in one day
*15 arena wins in one day gives them Bone Warrior which gives them a +2 stamina boost when attacking any kaijuu (since the other give +5 when attacking a specific kaijuu, I figured since this bloodline doesn't deal with a specific stat it could apply to all kaijuu types but give the user less hp return per attack)
*Upon Jonin ascension the ability to unlock a jutsu called "Spine Whip Jutsu" which increases the range by 2 and costs around 50 to 70 chakra (not too sure).

I think anymore than that would be over powering it in comparison to the other bloodlines. I didn't put too much thought, just kind of came on and thought I'd say something about the Kaguya.

Knowledge of the Core
- You can bend the rules of the world around you as you see fit, provided you have enough core for it
- By spending a certain amount of core you can
*Auto win a mission and get whatever is hidden on it (allies, items and events)
*Increase JXP/AP/RXP/style/rep/storm MPH/friend points/kaiju damage/ryo bonus% for the day (each one is bought separatedly)
*Get an extra life for fighting phases, only once per phase
- +10% core
- moon does not wane with time
- can force one fight to go monocrome per day
- +2 edge
- +1 drain
disclaimer: this ability was based on nothing at all, any resemblance with something you may have seen is mere coincidence

Poke of Restoring
- a hidden power has awakened inside you. You can acheive heightened concentration and manipulate a person's life energy
- once per day you may use one special skill you may learn from your medical allies
*Dr. Stylish: "Restoring Style: Slow-mo-fo" (halves difficulty)
*Dr. Mark: "Restoring Style: You Are Fine Now" (unbingos one player of your choice, cannot be yourself)
*Dr. Value: "Restoring Style: Godmode" (on the first round of bingo you will receive no damage, on the next, you will recover 10hp)
*Dr. Fakename: "Restoring Style: Healing Rate Up" (any hp bonuses you get while bingoing are increased by 25%, lasts one battle)
WARNING: if you try to use the same skill twice or two different skills on the same day you will be stamina-locked (stamina will be locked at 0 until next dayroll)
- quest: Think Harder: "Stylish and Mark are discussing how to improve the Poke of Restoring…"
*Requires Dr. Stylish, Dr. Mark and must have unbingoed at least 10 ninja
*Must have their abilities
*Must not be bingoed
*Must not have used any ability of the Poke of Restoring
*At the end you get the "Restoring Style: Stopwatch" (Used before entering a bingo. Opponent cannot attack for 3 turns. Unbingoable teams are innefective. Can run away from bingo with no adverse effects while active).

The bingo is not a normal bingo either. While the victim would not loose their theme or item, Red Water would not reduce bingo time, and they couldn't use Cure Right Wounds. When you complete this mission, you would get Extracted Spirit (of whichever one you get). Another factor, for seventy two hours, the victim's village will have the ability to bingo you despite the fact that you're not in a village (A special Ronin 'village' would appear in their bingo screen) Also the use of note pages in both the first bingo and retaliatory bingos would be forbidden.

This Extracted Spirit is given to the Akasuki leader, Hurt, in the next and penultimate special mission of this section. You would then have to beat up Hurt in the final special mission and pluck his eye out and put in your socket.

What the RingEyeactually does:

  • +3.5% AP/XP per Rank (cumulative with Redeye). Does not round.
  • +.5 Levels per rank on regular missions (round up, cumulative with WhiteEye)
  • Ringeye: Innate Jutsu, 100 Chakra, Effects of Lvl 1 WhiteEye or RedEye as appropriate.
  • RingEye does not level (so you will not get +1 Str and/or +2 Lvl from using
  • You would receive the occasional insight when bingoing like a Redeye does (but it's only half as likely to occur).
  • RingEye does not give you access to WhiteEye or Redeye only jutsu (but if you all ready were a White/Red Eye, you don't loose them).
  • Jutsu with an Elemental effect (Fire Style: Whatever, Blizzard Jutsu, The Shocker, probably others) will cost half chakra. Reaper jutsu would not be affected even if the name or description implied an element (like Archer Style: Fire and Flame jutsu).

This is a reference to Pain or Tobi (I forget which) from Naruto.

Another Bloodline I would make
Hands of God

  • In exchange for 100 Stamina, you would unbingo someone.
  • There would be a board advertising your services, with a list of fees (most likely two fees, as you would probably want to give people in your village a discount) in Ryo. You set your own fee, with a minimum of 10,000 Ryo.
  • Once a patient clicks on your name in the board, the fee would be deducted, you would loose 100 Stamina, and the patient would be unbingoed.
  • Once your stamina dips below 100, your name is removed from the board until next dayroll. Your name will not be returned earlier, even if you raise your stamina level above 100.
  • A Kage can allow someone to draw on Village Ryo rather than their own. This would be done via a permission.

You would also get an ally with this bloodline, Tumor (may form a team with Sicko) who would reduce the Stamina loss for unbingoing a patient to 75.

This bloodline is a Blackjack reference, rather than a Trauma Center reference.

item.title: If You Could Make A Bloodline...
item.content:encoded:
I think I'd make GreenEyes.

  • +7% ryo per rank (like how RedEyes get +7% XP per rank).
  • The GreenEye Jutsu would let you reroll one die per rank, maybe. I'm not sure exactly about how to do this one.
  • GreenEye-specific jutsu available from MC Stripeypants, Billy, Cato, The Rack, and other wealthy/merchant/lucky/unlucky ninja. Would require the use of Sham Rocks for more powerful jutsu.
  • Slightly higher luck on the Prize Wheel and on the Slots.

…think that would cover it.
